meanings.sent1: She wore an immaculate white dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen floor was immaculate after she scrubbed it clean.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fur looked immaculate after it rolled around in the fresh laundry.
meanings.sent4: The snow-covered landscape was immaculate, untouched by human footprints.
meanings.sent5: His handwriting was so immaculate that it looked printed.

meanings.sent1: The car's interior was immaculate, as if it had just rolled off the assembly line.
meanings.sent2: She always kept her workspace immaculate, with everything in its place.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick left the audience in awe, as the handkerchief emerged immaculate from the empty hat.
meanings.sent4: The lake reflected the sky so perfectly, it seemed to create an immaculate mirror image.
meanings.sent5: The glass windows were so immaculate, they were practically invisible.

meanings.sent1: Her performance in the play was immaculate, not a single mistake made.
meanings.sent2: The jeweler's craftsmanship was immaculate, with each piece flawless.
meanings.sent3: The detective's investigation was so immaculate, he solved the case in record time.
meanings.sent4: The plan was executed with immaculate precision, leaving no room for error.
meanings.sent5: His memory was so immaculate, he could recall every detail of the event.
